name: SuperBook
description:
Download for FREE the sports betting app from the #1 Race & Sports Book in Las Vegas - the SuperBook! Keep the action and excitement right at your fingertips with direct access to the world’s largest Race & Sports Book menu – real-time, prop bets, futures and more!

Features:

* Real Cash Sports Wagering
* Bet on ALL MAJOR SPORTS - straight bets, parlays, teasers and round robins
* Place bets 24 hours a day 7 days a week from anywhere in Nevada
* Enhanced security features providing safe and secure wagering
